game.title: Chinese Medicine Game
game.selectPrescriptionHerbs: Select herbs according to the prescription
game.guess: Guess you want to make these prescriptions：
game.alertSelectHerb: Please select at least one herb
game.intro: Play the role of an ancient Chinese doctor and experience the pleasure of preparing prescriptions. This will help deepen your understanding of traditional Chinese medicine formulas.
helpContent: This is a Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) Prescription Simulator. Users can freely select herbs to simulate the process of formulating a prescription.
- The left section is the herb selection area.
- You can switch herb categories at the top (e.g., by function or flavor/nature).
- Click on a cabinet door to select the corresponding herb.
- Selected herbs appear in the right section.
- Click on a herb name to remove it from the selection.
- After clicking the 'Finish Prescription' button, the system will:
- Search the database for exact matches;
- And list partial matches (fuzzy results) based on the selected herbs.
helpContentPre: Welcome to the Herbal Prescription Challenge Game.
In this game, you will try to recreate a classic TCM prescription by selecting herbs.
- First, choose a prescription from the list.
- Then, select herbs from the list based on your knowledge or guesses.
- You can switch herb browsing mode at the top: by category or classification.
- Selected herbs will be displayed below the prescription name.
- Click a selected herb again to remove it from your selection.
- After clicking the 'Submit' button, the system will:
- Compare your selection with the actual prescription;
- Show extra herbs that should not be included;
- Show missing herbs that should be included;
- And give a final result indicating success or failure.

homepageManagement.emptyUrl: Please enter both Chinese and English image URLs

homePage.herbWikiDescription: Explore our comprehensive herb encyclopedia, where you can learn about various medicinal herbs, their uses, and health benefits in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM).
homePage.preWikiDescription: Discover a collection of well-known and effective prescriptions used in Traditional Chinese Medicine. Understand their ingredients, preparation methods, and therapeutic benefits.
homePage.quizDescription: Test your knowledge of Chinese medicine with interactive quizzes! Challenge yourself on topics like herbs, prescriptions, and TCM principles while improving your understanding.
homePage.gameDescription: Engage with our fun and educational games that allow you to learn about Chinese medicinal herbs and prescriptions through interactive challenges and mini-games.
homePage.storyDescription: Uncover the fascinating history and origins of Traditional Chinese Medicine. Learn about the cultural significance and the legendary figures who shaped TCM.
homePage.contactDescription: Learn more about the creators of this website and how to get in touch with us. We are always eager to hear your feedback and answer any questions you may have.
homePage.aboutUsContent: We are a dedicated team of Traditional Chinese Medicine enthusiasts and developers committed to providing an interactive, educational platform. Our mission is to make TCM knowledge accessible, engaging, and fun for learners worldwide.
homePage.aboutTcm: As a representative feature of Chinese civilization, traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) is a medical science that was formed and developed in the daily life of the people and in the process of their fight against diseases over thousands of years. It has made a great contribution to the nation's procreation and the country's prosperity, in addition to producing a positive impact on the progress of human civilization.
